version_description:
- Optimized Officer sizes.
- Optimized Resource Chest notices on the Revenge of Dr. Octopus event interface.
- Fixed the effect issue on some buildings.
- Optimized iOS screen adaptive issues.
- Privacy policy is now unchecked by default.

- Added an anti-addiction system for teenagers.
- The Xmas event will be here soon! Snowing effects have been added to Xmas skins.

- The Xmas event will be here soon!
- Fixed bugs.
Some of you may have encountered a display issue for your buildings in your bases after the launch of the Xmas version. This issue has been resolved.

- Happy new year! The Spring Festival event is available now.
- The fifth Officer slot and Van Gogh are available now!
- Optimized Exchange Center schedules.

- The 6th Officer slot is available now. New Officer Plato has arrived!
- Optimized adaptation issues on some devices.
- Fixed bugs.

-We have upgraded the Customer Service System.It will allow you to enjoy even better service in the new version.
- Optimized adaptation issues on some devices.
- Fixed bugs.

- Added a direct login entry for Apple accounts
- Upgraded Facebook SDK
- Fixed bugs
Solve some issues related to player chat rooms
